cohort.cohort_description: Structured learning, live classes and personalised feedback to kickstart your data analyst/business analyst career. Join the NextLeap Data Analyst Fellowship!

curriculum: Introduction to Data Analytics: Understanding Types of Data. Metrics & types of analysis. Steps in exploratory data analysis. Introduction to data visualisation
Data Preparation using Excel: Basic Functions & Shortcuts. Data Formatting Techniques. Data Cleaning Techniques. Data Protection & Error Validation
Data Analysis using Excel: Lookup & Merging Techniques. PivotTable & Grouping. Conditional Formatting. Scenario and Sensitivity Analysis
Data Visualisation using Excel: Charts and Visualization Techniques. Data Visualisation Best Practices. Pivot Charts. Building interactive Dashboards
Data Analysis using SQL: Introduction to Database. Selection, Filtering & Ordering. Data Types, Operators and functions. Aggregate and Group By commands
Data Manipulation with SQL: Conditional and Case Statements. Working with date/timestamps. Joins. Subqueries
Advanced Data Manipulation with SQL: Common Table Expression (CTE). Window functions in SQL. SET operators
Data Preparation & Exploration with Tableau: Loading Data on Tableau. Data Cleaning & Preparation Techniques. Aggregation and Logical Functions. Filters & Analytics in Tableau
Data Visualisation with Tableau: Understanding Chart Types. Creating Charts in Tableau. LOD and Calculated Fields. Creating Dashboards & Stories
Introduction to Python: Python Environment setup. Programming Fundamentals. Data Types. Strings, Sets, Tuples & List
Programming in Python: Dictionaries. Conditional Statements. Loop and Control Flow. Functions
Data Analysis using Python: Mathematical Computing using Numpy. Data Manipulation using Pandas. Exploratory Data Analysis using Pandas. Confirmatory Data Analysis in Python
Data Visualisation using Python: Introduction to Python Libraries. Creating plots with Matplotlib. Visualisation using Seaborn. Interactive Visualisation with Plotly
Interview Prep & Portfolio Building: Interview Preparation. Resume Building. Portfolio Building. Graduation Test & Projects
Descriptive and Inferential statistics: Z-score. Central Limit Theorem, p-value. Hypothesis testing. Power analysis
Database Design with SQL: Understanding Data Storage concepts. Data Modeling & Schema Design. Normalisation & denormalization. Working with Views
Data Storytelling for Analysts: Data storytelling. Chart Types. Trend Visualisation

placement_info: Landing your dream data analyst or business analyst job is our priority. Our placement support includes:

Resume and LinkedIn Optimization:Craft a winning resume and LinkedIn profile that highlights your strengths in data analyticsMock Interviews:Prepare with industry-relevant data analyst and business analyst interview questionsInterview with Hiring Partners:Become a Top Fellow and tap into our network of 500+ hiring companies, including top startups and tech companies

Are you ready to harness the power of data and launch a rewarding career? The NextLeap Data Analyst Fellowship is your gateway to becoming a skilled data analyst/business analyst in today's data-driven world. Our comprehensive program combines cutting-edge curriculum, hands-on projects, and placement support to set you up for success in the booming field of data analytics.
